articles.title: China refused call with Pentagon chief on day of balloon downing: US - CNA
articles.description: WASHINGTON: Beijing rejected a request for a secure call between Pentagon chief Lloyd Austin and his counterpart on the day an American warplane shot down a suspected Chinese surveillance balloon
articles.content:
Austin and Wei met in Cambodia last November as Washington and Beijing sought to lower the temperature after a visit by then-speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi that enraged China.
